overview: It's been a banner year for Studio 2000 and continuing on this roll, director extraordinaire John Travis presents his newest extravaganza, Cadet. Exploring "don't ask; don't tell" within the confines of a military academy, Travis finds a hotbed of horny male sex. Studio 2000's top gun exclusives, massive Mark Slade, charismatic Chris Steele and awesome Nick Savage, bend over backward -- and forward -- to bring macho military meat back to the screen.
title: Cadet
